response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it is valued at $15,000 by us. Considering its worth to you, we are extending this opportunity to acquire it for $13,500. This offer reflects a thoughtful balance between our valuation and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. We believe this product will significantly enhance your experience and contribute positively to your endeavors. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 13500}
